name: bold, italics cross lines
input:
Bold and italics should //be
able// to cross lines.

But, should //not be...

...able// to cross paragraphs.
output:
Bold and italics should be able to cross lines.

But, should //not be...

...able// to cross paragraphs.

comment: altered from spec as we do parse markup within headings (permitted but not required by the spec)
name: headings
input:
= Level 1 (largest) =
== Level 2 ==
=== Level 3 ===
==== Level 4 ====
===== Level 5 =====
====== Level 6 ======
=== Also level 3
=== Also level 3 =
=== Also level 3 ==
=== **not** //parsed// ===

name: linking
input:
[[link]]
[[MyBigPage|Go to my page]]

[[http://www.wikicreole.org/]]
http://www.rawlink.org/, http://www.another.rawlink.org
[[http://www.wikicreole.org/|Visit the WikiCreole website]]
[[Weird Stuff|**Weird** //Stuff//]]
[[Ohana:WikiFamily]]
output:
link Go to my page

http://www.wikicreole.org/ http://www.rawlink.org/, http://www.another.rawlink.org Visit the WikiCreole website **Weird** //Stuff// Ohana:WikiFamily

name: paragraphs
input:
This is my text.

This is more text.
output:
This is my text.

This is more text.

bug: we don't handle line breaks within paragraphs for some reason
name: line breaks
input: This is the first line,\and this is the second.
output:
This is the first line,
and this is the second.

bug: we don't yet cope with code braces as per the spec
name: no wiki code with closing braces
output:
if (x != NULL) {
  for (i = 0; i  size; i++) {
    if (x[i]  0) {
      x[i]--;
  }}}
